resources.string: You can apply your custom font directly by adding fontFamily tag in your xml code.
You can also create your own font family. Which can be used directly in your custom theme.
You can also use other languages fonts as shown below.
चूंकि मानव अधिकारों के प्रति उपेक्षा और घृणा के फलस्वरूप ही ऐसे बर्बर कार्य हुए जिनसे मनुष्य
